content.text:
## Analysis of the Main Target Image

The main target image shows two separate structures:

**Structure 1 (Left Side):**
- Total blocks: 7
- Layers: 4
- Arrangement:
  - Bottom layer: Yellow rectangular block placed horizontally
  - Second layer: Red block with a semicircular cutout on the front
  - Third layer: Green rectangular block placed horizontally
  - Top layer: Two blue cubic blocks placed side by side
  - Additional: Orange triangular block attached to the side of the structure

**Structure 2 (Right Side):**
- Total blocks: 4
- Layers: 3
- Arrangement:
  - Bottom layer: Two orange cylindrical blocks placed parallel to each other
  - Middle layer: Yellow rectangular block placed horizontally across the cylinders
  - Top layer: One blue cubic block placed on the right side of the yellow block

## Selected Blocks from Dictionary

For Structure 1 (Left Side):
- Bottom layer: Yellow rectangular block (index 8)
- Second layer: Red block with semicircular cutout (index 3)
- Third layer: Green rectangular block (index 6)
- Top layer: Blue cubic blocks (index 4) - used twice
- Side: Orange triangular block (index 16)

For Structure 2 (Right Side):
- Bottom layer: Orange cylindrical blocks (index 11) - used twice
- Middle layer: Yellow rectangular block (index 8)
- Top layer: Blue cubic block (index 4)

## Assembly Order

Structure 1 (Left Side):
```
Step1: Move block with index 8
Step2: Move block with index 3
Step3: Move block with index 6
Step4: Move block with index 4
Step5: Move block with index 4
Step6: Move block with index 16
```

Structure 2 (Right Side):
```
Step7: Move block with index 11
Step8: Move block with index 11
Step9: Move block with index 8
Step10: Move block with index 4
```
